## Opinions about fruit


```{r getdatasetup, include=FALSE, echo=FALSE}
#install.packages("ggplot2")
library(ggplot2)

# Survey results question 1
q1 <- sample(c("Apples","Bananas"), 50, replace = TRUE, prob=c(0.8, 0.2))
# Survey results question 2

df <- data.frame(q1) 

  
```


This survey was completed by `r length(q1)` participants.


```{r question1, echo=FALSE}

# Colors
fruitcolors=c("#86D76E", "#E3F25A", "#913838","#E8A22B")

p1 <- ggplot(df, aes(x = q1, fill = q1)) +
  geom_bar()+
  theme_bw()+
  scale_fill_manual(values= fruitcolors)+
  theme(legend.position = "none")+ 
  xlab("Fruit")+
  ylab("Number of Participants")+
  labs(title = "What is your favourite fruit?")

p1

```
